name: Pin City - Intro
description:
Here's my small game-that-doesn't-exist intro for the  GB Studio Jam (Skittle Special #2).

I wanted to try and make some crazy effects like Link's Awakening intro and such, but quickly realized that GB Studio wasn't meant for that!

Spent too much time trying to hack stuff together, so in the end it's a bit incomprehensible and lacks homogeneity... but I had fun!

Make sure to click in the game window on mobile to enable the Music.
